function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for non-compliance with rules and requests","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to rule breaking behavior","Mitigation":"Implement proactive measures to reduce practical opportunities for rule breaking, and reinforce the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, automated monitoring systems","People":"General public, individuals in built environments","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility managers"},{"Description":"Higher impulsivity predicting non-compliance","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to impulsivity leading to rule breaking behavior","Mitigation":"Provide education and awareness programs to address impulsivity and promote compliance with rules and regulations","Technologies":"Behavioral intervention technology, educational software","People":"Individuals at risk of non-compliance","Owner":"Health educators, behavior change specialists"},{"Description":"Influence of social norms on compliance","Impact":"Potential for non-compliance based on the observed behavior of others","Mitigation":"Promote positive social norms through public awareness campaigns and community engagement","Technologies":"Social influence modeling, social media campaigns","People":"Community members, individuals in social settings","Owner":"Community leaders, social influencers"}]}
